Class Edge

  • java.lang.Object
    • Edge

  • public class Edge
extends java.lang.Object
    This represents an edge in the adjacency list of the airline route graph.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int dest 
      private double mileage 
      private int origin 
      private double price 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor that exists solely to allow access to comparator methods easily

      Edge constructor that takes two vertices, a price weight, and a mileage weight

      • Edge

        public Edge(int origin,
            int dest,
            double price,
            double mileage)
        Edge constructor that takes two vertices, a price weight, and a mileage weight
        Parameters:
        origin - the integer represented origin vertex
        dest - the integer represented destination vertex
        price - the price based edge weight
        mileage - the flight distance weight in miles

        Return's the edge's price weight

      • weight

        public double weight(int weightSelect)
        Returns the weight matching the input parameter Equal weight for 0, mileage weight for 1, price weight for 2
        Parameters:
        weightSelect - integer that chooses which weight to return
        Returns:
        the weight as a double
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the weight is not 0,1, or 2
